DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine increase consumption low-fat dairy reduce blood pressure improve endothelial function men woman pre stage-1 hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Effects Low-fat Dairy Systolic Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Subject female male , 2069 year age , inclusive . Subject BMI 18.5 39.9 kg/m2 , inclusive . Subject rest blood pressure measurement meet criterion prehypertension ( SBP = 120 139 mm Hg and/or DBP = 80 89 mm Hg ) stage 1 hypertension ( SBP = 140 159 mm Hg DBP = 90 99 mm Hg ) Subject report history consuming , average , ≤2 servings/d dairy food part normal diet Subject willing consume ≤1 serving/d dairy food ( study product provide ) treatment phase . Subject willing maintain stable body weight habitual diet physical activity pattern throughout trial , exception specific study instruction relate study product intake , alcohol intake , physical activity . Subject know coronary heart disease ( CHD ) CHD risk equivalent Subject history major trauma major surgical event Subject digital deformity would prevent EndoPAT measurement . Subject use medication know alter body weight Subject use medication dietary supplement , opinion Investigator , strong potential influence blood pressure endothelial function Subject extreme dietary habit ( e.g. , Atkins diet , high protein/low carbohydrate ) .
